tool.name: Paired bam to bed12
tool.description: Paired Bam to Bed. With samtools sorting by name beforehand and back to required order for galaxy afterwards.
tool.command: samtools sort -n -O bam -T by_name -o sorted_by_name.bam "${input}" ; pairedBamToBed12 -i sorted_by_name.bam > "${output}"

param.name: input
param.label: Select BAM dataset to convert to bed

tool.help:
This tools runs pairedbamtobed12 to convert a paired bam file to a bed file.
As pairedbamtobed12 requires a bam file sorted by name, while galaxy only allows ones sorted by alignment this tool first uses Samtools to reorder the bam file.
